address1: New No.8, Old No.Z-190,   5th Street, Z Block,áAnna Nagar,áChennai

partnerDetails.about:
Techmech Engineers was established in 1985 Bangalore as an electrical goods distribution firm. We started with a small portfolio and soon diversified by entering into strategic partnerships with international companies such as Schneider Electric, C&S, Hensel, Prok dv’s, Control4 etc.

In 2005, we took a step into the world of Home Automation and Lighting Control. We develop and integrate a complete suite of solutions that redefines the modern age Home and Commercial Automation. We cohesively address lighting controls, audio / video, video door phone, CCTV system, intrusion system and digital door lock needs of today’s most advanced environments. 

Our 32-year-old successful journey has culminated us one of the biggest System Integrators and Distributors for Schneider Electric in South India. Our customers include CISCO, Chennal Metro Rail, Taj, Oberoi, Sheraton etc. 

With exceptional customer service and a dedicated technical support team, Techmech Engineers will be there for you from start to finish and everything in between.

descriptions.description:

In 2005, we took a step into the world of Home Automation and Lighting Control. We develop and integrate a complete suite of solutions that redefines the modern age Home and Commercial Automation. We cohesively address lighting controls, audio / video, video door phone, CCTV system, intrusion system and digital door lock needs of today’s most advanced environments. 

Our 32-year-old successful journey has culminated us one of the biggest System Integrators and Distributors for Schneider Electric in South India. Our customers include CISCO, Chennal Metro Rail, Taj, Oberoi, Sheraton etc. 

With exceptional customer service and a dedicated technical support team, Techmech Engineers will be there for you from start to finish and everything in between.
